#labels Documentation
*Encryption process*

A basic example of the encryption process using the binary mode.
Available modes:
 * CRYPT_MODE_BINARY
 * CRYPT_MODE_BASE64
 * CRYPT_MODE_HEXADECIMAL

{{{
<?php
require_once 'Crypt.class.php';

$Crypt = new Crypt(CRYPT_MODE_BINARY, CRYPT_HASH_SHA1);
$Crypt->Key = 'foo';
echo $Crypt->Encode('bar');
?>
}}}

*Hash process*

A basic example of the hash process.

{{{
<?php
require_once 'Crypt.class.php';

$Crypt = new Crypt(CRYPT_MODE_BINARY, CRYPT_HASH_SHA1);
$Crypt->Key = 'foo';
echo $Crypt->Hash('bar');
?>
}}}
